full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Solicitation Number
W8485-247804/A
## Project Title
Indicator, Liquid Quantity

### Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals for the provision of indicators of liquid quantity. The tender is open to all qualified suppliers and is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation document.

### Item Description
Item 1: Liquid Quantity Indicator

*	Quantity: 5 units
*	Unit of Issue: EA (Each)
*	Delivery Location: CFSD Montreal, 25 François Authier Street, Montreal, QC H3A 1B5

### Submission Requirements
Bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the solicitation document. Electronic submissions via epost Connect are strongly encouraged due to reduced business hours and limited staff availability at the bid receiving unit.

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*	The supplier's ability to meet the specified requirements
*	The price and other terms and conditions

### Contact Information
Audrée Poissant-Viau
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Email: [audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca](mailto:audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: 00
Fax: (None)

### Competition Information
The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA).

### Closing and Evaluation
The tender closing date and time is January 18, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST. Proposals must be received by the bid receiving unit on or before the closing date and time. Evaluation will be conducted in accordance with the evaluation criteria outlined in this document. …~please populate the conducting “Terms of contract”

### Contract Value and Duration
The estimated contract value is $X, and the contract term is anticipated to begin on December 2023 and end on March 2024.

### Important Notes
Please note that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement, and documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Please let me know if you need me to add or modify anything. markdown format is preferred.  Thanks!
